reviewText: Fun to watch some of the selected old time country artists.  It is as advertised a small selection of cuts out of the Reunion Show.  Bill Anderson and Larry Black introduce the segments being shown. They provide some interesting stories.

I bought this for my husband for his birthday.  He LOVES it!  He loves it so much, I will probably be buying more country family reunion dvds in the future.  In fact, I have bought a few already, but this one set seems to be his favorite!  I believe it was used, but it is in very good condition - can't tell it isn't new!!!
